Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: This was my first venture into the LCD market. I bought it a few years ago and it's has been a good tv with decent picture and audio. Since getting this tv, I have viewed many other LCD tv's and found that the picture on this is not bad compared to higher end tv's. There are some downfalls though. For one thing, if you are viewing the tv at more than a 30 degree angle, the picture becomes blurred and grainy. The color could also be better but for a relatively cheap tv, it's not bad. The one thing that really threw me off was the lack of any audio output. I recently bought a set of wireless headphones so I could listen to the tv at night without bothering others in my family who are trying to sleep. I was shocked and disappointed to find that there is absolutely no audio output. In my opinion, this is a major flaw in the tv. If it weren't for this, I wouldn't hesitate to buy a Proscan TV again.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, Great price
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I chose this tv for the price and at the time free shipping.  So far it's very good quality, but I cannot program my DTV remote to completely interact with it.  It seems as though this particular product's model  number is not on their list.  So I am stuck using 2 remotes.  The Proscan remote for volume and power,  and the DTV remote to change channels.  Other than that it performs well and I like that it has 2 speakers for good sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Got this tv 3 years ago, still holding strong
Reviews.Author: Timothy Tharp
Reviews.Content: i didn't buy this from amazon, i actually bought it from best buy. i see all these review talking about it being broken and bad, well i have had mine going on three years now and it still works like a champ. i have a gaming monitor that has 2 ms response time, and when i play on this i don't notice any delay, so im assuming the response time on this is 2 ms as well. i use it every day for at least 6 hours, and it has lasted me this long. so for $276, this is a great deal for a great tv.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Macy
Reviews.Content: It does everything that I know how to get it to. Great picture no problems from the side. Happy, happy, happy!

Reviews.Title: Terrible picture quality
Reviews.Author: roberto
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a beach house 2.5 hours away.  The picture quality is poor, it has a line dividing the screen.  I had thrown away the box & its 2.5 hours back & forth so I did not return it...yes lazy.  Save your money, buy a better brand.

Reviews.Title: never heard of proscan
Reviews.Author: Susan Curatello
Reviews.Content: has a great picture  im very happy with it as my bedroom TV  clear pic  sound could be a little better  but its certainly not terrible  happy to get it at the price I did

Reviews.Title: Great picture.....tinny sound quality.
Reviews.Author: Laurie Sherman McPherson
Reviews.Content: For the price this is an awesome deal.... The picture quality is great, even on non-HD programs. The available adjustments menu is precise and allows complete customization. But the sound is lacking. It is hollow sounding. I have it connected to the surround sound system but am considering a sound bar. I would recommend this product for anyone who is looking for a second TV or perhaps a dorm room.  Good value.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Mary Hough
Reviews.Content: I do not watch a lot of TV, so do not need TVs with lots of bells and whistles.  This does the job well.  It is in my living room so gets used only when I have my annual family visit.  The color is good, as is sound.  It was easy to set up.  I have not tried to run a DVD on it yet, but think it will be fine.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 2.5 months.
Reviews.Author: Vincent A Brown
Reviews.Content: This is the second electronic item I bought through Amazon that didn't work and the last. Last year I bought an Itouch that had to be replaced. At least that was obvious right away. This item just shut down for no apparent reason after 2.5 months , so now I have a $300 paperweight. If I had this  even closer to a year I'd understand.Try finding support for this POS; good luck.  If I bought this refurbished or second hand I'd get it. Both of these were brand new so I don't , unless Amazon buys refurbished  items and puts them out as new. From now on if I need an electronic item I'm going to Newegg. I've never had a problem there.

Reviews.Title: So far, I like it.
Reviews.Author: Hot Air
Reviews.Content: Less than three months of use is much too soon to rate a TV, but I like it for now.  One doesn't expect much from a TV.  It gives a good picture, mediocre sound, turns on and off reliably.  What more can one ask?

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 6 months
Reviews.Author: C. Osburn
Reviews.Content: This is not a reliable TV. I have other TV's that have lasted decades. This unit stopped working after 6 months. Avoid this product if you don't want to ship the product to the manufacturer at your own cost.

Reviews.Title: Buy TV's At Costco, can return them easily, not with this POS
Reviews.Author: Barbara A.
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for my disabled adult niece who lives in another state. It was shipped to her in July 2013. She had someone set it up and it worked fine for 10 months and now no picture. She had the cable company send someone out to check on the problem and it is the TV not the cable. Since I had it shipped to her, the "original receipt and warranty card" went to her. She didn't hang on to any of the paperwork. I looked up how to claim a defective TV on the Proscan site and she would have to ship it back to the manufacturer at her cost. Meanwhile, all of the packaging was tossed out months ago.What a total hassle and not worth it. If you buy a TV at Costco, even if it is a fews YEARS old, not months, you can just bring it in and they will give you a store credit towards a new one. Never buying a TV from Amazon or Proscan.  I will continue to buy other stuff from Amazon though.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Picture
Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: The color/tint is completely off on this tv. Also the contrast is washed out. You can try to change some of the settings but you never get a true color/contrast rendering. Also BE AWARE: If you are using an HDMI connnection you CANNOT change the tint setting. It only allows this setting to be changed when you use the old low-resolution coaxial cable to connect to your cable box or dvd player. I highly DO NOT RECOMMEND this product. Especially since you have to live with it for a good long while.

Reviews.Title: Dead 2 months out of warranty
Reviews.Author: J. Banning
Reviews.Content: Bought the tv at Kmart 14 months ago. Programming the Directv remote was a real pain. Had to painstakingly search through the codes one by one. Never could find one to handle all the remote functions - just off/on and volume. A call to customer service was no help. Now the tv is dead - naturally just after the 12 month warranty ended. I'll probably stick more to the big names from now on.

Reviews.Title: Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Chicken Blade
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv from a local retailer at a discount price. Well the tvs stand did not come with the required screws. I went ahead and placed it on the stand and it got not over and cracked the digitizer. I tried emailing and calling their phone number to no avail and the oversea customer service did not understand my questions. they kept saying warranty does not cover this when I was not even speaking of the warranty. So now im screwed... pun intended...

Reviews.Title: Cheap tv should have a cheap price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Out of the box this was one of the cheapest made Tvs I have ever seen for the price I paid I expected better and didnt have a good feeling about it, sadly it turns out I was right.. It stopped working 3 weeks later. I couldnt understand the customer service gentleman. I will be returning this for a better brand. Not worth my time.

Reviews.Title: Take your chances like I did, then LOOSE!
Reviews.Author: Backyard Sharpshooter
Reviews.Content: Two of the three HDMI ports didn't work properly.  The front bezel was cracked upon receipt.  Thank God I bought through Amazon and not another seller.  They worked great with me.  They offered tech support then either a discount or return if I preferred.  I took the return as today's electronics are iffy to me if not perfect from the start.  Amazon paid for shipping and gave me a discount on my next purchase.  Five stars for them!

Reviews.Title: JUNK JUNK JUNK DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: AQUARIST40
Reviews.Content: We got this for my son for Christmas to go in his room, it worked for 2 days, the next morning it would not turn on until I unplugged it and plugged it back in, problem solved..(I thought).. It then went haywire with a static screen and blasted static noise out the speakers until I unplugged it again. These units are Junk, they are very cheaply made and for the price they cost I would DEMAND better quality. I will be returning it and buying a Vizio at least I know what I am getting.

ProductInfo.Features:
Proscan 39-Inch Flatscreen LED HD TV; 16:09 Widescreen Aspect Ratio
3 x HDMI Ports, 1080p, FULL High Definition Resolution
Connections: 3 x HDMI, VGA, YPbPr, PC Audio, AV Audio/Video, Headphone, Coax, RF
Wall Mount Ready; Includes Full Function Remote Control
ProductInfo.Name: Proscan 39-Inch LCED HD TV, 1080p - FULL HD
